turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, Mike.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi Paul. What's up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to make a Starbucks order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. What can I get you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Chestnut Praline Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. It seems to be a seasonal item. I'll have to check if it is available.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I hope it is available. It is good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It is in stock.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is awesome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Non fat.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want whipped cream in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What sizes do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Grande, Short, Tall, Venti

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll have a Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to pick it up at Penn State University HUB Robinson.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right. It will be ready in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks. Have a good night. Bye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You too. Bye.
